    public abstract class AbstractBeanMapperTest
extends io.oasp.module.test.common.base.ModuleTest
    The abstract test-case for testing BeanMapper via its interface.

      protected abstract BeanMapper getBeanMapper() 
      void testMapEntity2Eto()
      Tests BeanMapper.mapTypesafe(Class, Object, Class) for an entity to an ETO and ensures that if the modification counter gets updated after conversion that the ETO reflects this change.
